docs.snippet: Bishop O'Connor, who recently resigned the charge of his diocese, is now in Pittsburgh. It is his intention to go to Rome at an early day. Rumor, says the Pittsburgh Chronicle, has connected his name with the office of Principal of the American...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bishop O'Connor, who recently resigned the charge of his diocese, is now in Pittsburgh. It is his intention to go to Rome at an early day. Rumor, says the Pittsburgh Chronicle, has connected his name with the office of Principal of the American College in that city, but the state of his health would seem to forbid his accepting the appointment.
